bibl.title: Letter from James McKeen Cattell to L.O. Howard, March 26, 1925

div1.p: Cattell expresses interest in Kean's review of the Gorgas biography, but notes that "Science" does not publish reprints.

div1.head: Letter from James McKeen Cattell to L.O. Howard, March 26, 1925
div1.opener:
SCIENCE
EDITORIAL DEPARTMENT
3939 Grand Central Terminal
New York, N.Y.
March 26, 1925
Dear Howard:
div1.p:
We are now here again, after
a very pleasant trip to Europe.

We shall be very glad indeed
if Colonel Kean will consent to write
a review of the Gorgas biography, and
the material might be much the same
as that printed in The Military Surgeon.
I fear, however, that we could not simply
reprint the review. This is something
that we have never done.
div1.closer:
Sincerely yours, J. McK. Cattell Dr. L. O. Howard
U. S. Department of Agriculture
Washington, D.C.
We trust that Mrs. Howard's
health is now greatly im-
proved. Please give her my
kindest regards.
J. McK. C.
BUREAU OF
ENTOMOLOGY
DEPARTMENT
OF AGRICULTURE
MAR 25
R E C E I V E D
